text: Vawutili, “Yumwi valulumi Vayisilaeli! Mututangi. Mundu ayu yavawula vandu vosi kila mahali milandu yingajila kulinganila na mlima wetu na Malawu va Chapanga vamupili Musa na nyumba ayi ya Chapanga. Kandi, pawileka ayi, kavayingisha Vagiliki munyumba ya Chapanga, kapapighasha mahali apa pang'alili.”
